# init(target:)

**Initializer**

Creates a look-at constraint for a specified target node.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(target: SCNNode?)
```

## Parameters

- **target**: The node that constrained nodes will be reoriented to point toward.

## Return Value

A constraint object.

## Discussion

To attach constraints to an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode] object, use its [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode/constraints] property.
